attributes.action: Demand Labour hold a full puplic inquiry into the rape gangs scandal.
attributes.additional_details: The puplic deserve to know the truth behind everyone involved in the cover up of the rape gangs scandal that has taken place over the last decade.
attributes.background: I don't want, i demand that the government hold a full enquiry into the rape gangs scandal as the government work for the people and the people have the right to know the truth and extent of the law breaking and cover up.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
